#summary Shows the code of a method in a tooltip from any call site.

= Introduction =

Provides an action 'ToggleMethodPreview' actionable from any method call whose source is available and provides that source as a preview window.

= Installation =

 * [http://www.rorybecker.me.uk/DevExpress/Plugins/Community/CR_MethodPreview/ Download]
 * [InstalationInstructions Install as usual]
 * Assign the 'ToggleMethodPreview' to a key. (see [http://rorybecker.blogspot.com/2009/08/how-to-bind-key-in-coderush.html Binding a Key])

= Usage =

 * Place caret on any Method Call for which the source is available within the solution.
 * Activate the 'ToggleMethodPreview' action using whichever key you bound to it.

 * Deactivate when done, using the same key.

= Notes =

This plugin currently shows the current.
